sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.LoadVariableAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>LoadVariableAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LoadVariableAjax = Class.create();
LoadVariableAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	loadVariableTemplate: function() {
		var jr =  new GlideJellyRunner();
		jr.setTwoPhase(true);
		jr.setEscaping(false);
		jr.setRenderProperties(new GlideRenderProperties());
		jr.setVariable("jvar_id", this.getParameter('jvar_id'));
		jr.setVariable("jvar_value", this.getParameter('jvar_value'));
		jr.setVariable("jvar_type", this.getParameter('jvar_type'));
		var template = jr.runMacro("variable_template");
		var result = this.newItem("result");
		result.setAttribute("template", template);
		return result;
	}
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-11-09 18:34:04</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2df86e729323020042cf530b547ffba3</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>LoadVariableAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog core applications" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog">56b149036d6620100acb70b35343305f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2df86e729323020042cf530b547ffba3</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2015-11-10 18:28:10</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>635</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
